overview:
Persuasive business development professional with broad base of functional experience in roles that span cloud computing and SaaS technology, eCommerce, mobile commerce, payments and finance.

Currently, seeing success with BD role in SaaS startup initiating and closing profitable emerging technology partnerships. Successfully juggling multiple partner relationships, assessing business opportunities, and tracking and analyzing results as driver of cross-functional team. Increasing revenue through proactive partner management in multiple commerce-related software verticals.

Lethal mix of dependability as a performer and flexibility when adapting to constantly shifting product, partner, and technology priorities.

Finance degree from Indiana Universityâ€™s Kelley School of Business in 2001.

degrees.subject: Finance
degrees.institution: Kelley School of Business - Indiana University
